definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

pinyin: di1 fang4 she4 xing4 fei4 wu4
fang4 she4 mian3 yi4 ce4 ding4
fang4 she4 xing4 tong2 wei4 su4
fang4 she4 xing4 zui4 qiang2 dian3

sentences.english: The use of radiation sources in medical and other applications is widespread throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今世界各地普遍在醫療和其它應用中使用放射源。

sentences.english: SPECT imaging will demonstrate decreased radiotracer uptake in the frontal and temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: SPECT成像顯示額顳葉放射性攝取減低。

sentences.english: This radioactive form of nitrogen does not occur in nature.
sentences.chinese: 氮的這種放射性形式在自然界中不會產生。

sentences.english: Radiological health protection standards for X-ray examinations of child-bearing age women and pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 育齡婦女和孕婦的X線檢查放射衛生防護標準。

sentences.english: Whither go these majestic irradiations of the soul?Into the shadow;
sentences.chinese: 靈魂的那種莊嚴光輝放射到什麼地方去呢？

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照劑量和居民的惡性腫瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Radiobiology (or radiation biology) seeks answers to these questions.
sentences.chinese: 放射生物學所研究的就是這些問題。

sentences.english: The development and spread of early western radiochemistry in China was searched through literatures.
sentences.chinese: 研究早期西方放射化學在中國的傳播和發展。

sentences.english: Objective To study and develop treatment planning system of intensity modulated radiotherapy(IMRT).
sentences.chinese: 目的研製開發調強放射治療逆向計劃系統。

sentences.english: For example, a reader may also capture the temperature or radioactivity of an item.
sentences.chinese: 例如，讀取器也可以捕捉物品的溫度或放射能。

sentences.english: In addition, the bamboo salt of far infrared radiation of poison also has.
sentences.chinese: 另外，竹鹽放射出的大量遠紅外線也具有排毒作用。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the pulmonary tuberculosis mortality risk of the residents in high background radiation area (HBRA), Yangjiang, China.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討天然放射性高本底地區居民肺結核死亡危險。

sentences.english: If the energy is sufficient, this electron will be emitted .
sentences.chinese: 如果能量是充分的，這個電子將被放射出來。

sentences.english: Chronic phase appearance of radiation hepatitis is similar to that of hepatocirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 慢性期放射性肝損傷類似肝硬化之表現。

sentences.english: Debao Ceramics has passed the certification from national Environmental ProtectionDepartment, which is considered as no radioactivity and anti-bacterium.
sentences.chinese: 德寶衛浴已通過國家環保局的無放射性及抗菌性認證。

sentences.english: The CyberKnife System has been used extensively for spine radiosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 射線切除系統已經廣泛應用於脊柱的放射外科。

definition: to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
